title: Issue a Certificate of Insurance (COI)
description: A small business owner needs a COI to provide to a client as proof of their general liability coverage.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct business owner's policy.

tasks.description: Collect the certificate holder's information (the client who is requesting the COI).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the certificate holder's name and address.

tasks.description: Generate the Certificate of Insurance and send it to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and emails the COI.
